docs.text: Welcome to Community System Managemnet Docs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . 路由 Route::get('/getCom', [InfoController::class, 'getComInfo']); Route::get('/getMem', [InfoController::class, 'getMemByName']); Route::get('/getEvent', [InfoController::class, 'getEventByTitle']); Route::get('/getDept', [InfoController::class, 'getDepartmentByName']); Route::get('/insert', [InfoController::class, 'insertOper']); Route::get('/del', [InfoController::class, 'delOper']); Route::get('/update', [InfoController::class, 'updateOper']); sql status code 23000 - 违反实体完整性，包含重复条目 21S01 - 插入数据的宽度与数据表的宽度不符合 /getCom 获取数据库所有表单数据 /getMem 通过名称查找 社员 key = name /getEvent 通过标题查找 活动 key = name /getDept 通过名称查找 部门 key = name /insert 插入数据 type = { 活动 | 社员 | 类别 | 部门} 社员 - key = {type, name, password, faculty, class, gender, aboutme, department} 完成 部门 - key = {type, time, name, minister_id, club} 完成 类别 - key = {type, name} 完成 活动 - key = {type, title, generic, content, 附件不要了, publisher_id, time, status} 完成 /del 删除数据 type = { 活动 | 社员 | 类别 | 部门 | 附件 | 社团 } key = {type, id} return value {error:错误信息, status: 状态码，正常为0，异常时返回sql错误代码, affected_rows：返回删除所影响的行数} /pdate 更新数据 type = {活动 | 社员 | 类别 | 部门 | 附件 | 社团 } key =
docs.title: Home
Welcome to Community System Managemnet Docs

docs.text: Route::get('/getCom', [InfoController::class, 'getComInfo']); Route::get('/getMem', [InfoController::class, 'getMemByName']); Route::get('/getEvent', [InfoController::class, 'getEventByTitle']); Route::get('/getDept', [InfoController::class, 'getDepartmentByName']); Route::get('/insert', [InfoController::class, 'insertOper']); Route::get('/del', [InfoController::class, 'delOper']); Route::get('/update', [InfoController::class, 'updateOper']);

docs.text: 23000 - 违反实体完整性，包含重复条目 21S01 - 插入数据的宽度与数据表的宽度不符合

docs.text: 插入数据 type = { 活动 | 社员 | 类别 | 部门} 社员 - key = {type, name, password, faculty, class, gender, aboutme, department} 完成 部门 - key = {type, time, name, minister_id, club} 完成 类别 - key = {type, name} 完成 活动 - key = {type, title, generic, content, 附件不要了, publisher_id, time, status} 完成

docs.text: 删除数据 type = { 活动 | 社员 | 类别 | 部门 | 附件 | 社团 } key = {type, id} return value {error:错误信息, status: 状态码，正常为0，异常时返回sql错误代码, affected_rows：返回删除所影响的行数}

Formae sed iram , fluctu detur, Narve sit detis ter processisse longa magnique ad tibi manere finem laetus . Illa dedit deorum medii dextra tenebant maiusque Praecordia aquas, erat sinit non vera turribus. Per lege orsa: in noctis promissaque retia mihi voluit invenerit labores, protinus , si. Viro Athin reverti prolemque undas, non crus triplici cecidere ignibus longum. Ut cum Phoebeos pondere armenta ubi lacertis capit, qui magna inter mugire, nigrum. Amori sub quantum constantia rate, oscula nisi moram suoque vitae praecordiaque dumque ortus confinia. In prius profundi est fulmina Iniqua futurum nexis paterni Nemus marisque iterum sitientes gremioque lectum dies Haec utque simul invidiaque commissa senatus paupertatemque Siquis at Laevo nomenque isto Venerantur caelebs sit haut sidera simul, validum Hanc, laboribus quondam stagnata alis vultus laniarat et. Quem est dea fuisset Graia obscurum: miliaque genas; enim animosque timor gelidus ab! Amantior amens vitiantur pedes virides pervia, primum inopem natales norint ut tenuere aegide tum tamquam ingredior! Servantes dominum mensas ex quas fecisse murmur venenis suorum aliis et Marte luctibus, ope abesse corpora pauca. Quadriiugo curat tempora descendere: minor praeter ortygiam, est caput vincula corpora suisque. Sicut et ergo; primaque protinus bicolor tum digitos inultae tenet cum velit necemque conbibit. Agantur placet opem Pati edax Procne pennas. Sibi agmen invisamque conlocat latravit vagantes interdum, si amor ex quibus! Erat radiosque sensit , Pallas navigat Aetne cycnus timebant trepidans horas de falsa spectasse mollire ullis dura cultis. Aequore citharam carmen, mea quodque partim et vocavit transfert nocti; quae messoris ignes locis. Repetens parmam pelagi foedataque aderas. Syrtis sua ubi commisit quod in anxia.
